Flow.description: This was a created by Save As the Screen Flow: Billing Main Flow as there are many bugs due to many versions in that flow

formulas.name: varMobileNumberValidation
formulas.expression: NOT( OR( LEN({!TMobile_Number}) != 10, NOT( OR( BEGINS({!TMobile_Number}, '6'), BEGINS({!TMobile_Number}, '7'), BEGINS({!TMobile_Number}, '8'), BEGINS({!TMobile_Number}, '9') )), !ISNUMBER({!TMobile_Number}) ) )

formulas.name: varShopPulsePointToAdd
formulas.expression: IF( AND( {!varTotalAmount} >= 1, {!varTotalAmount} < 100 ), 0, IF( AND( {!varTotalAmount} >= 100, {!varTotalAmount} < 500 ), 10, IF( AND( {!varTotalAmount} >= 500, {!varTotalAmount}< 1000 ), 20, IF( AND( {!varTotalAmount} >= 1000, {!varTotalAmount}< 5000 ), 30, 50 ) ) ) )

Flow.label: Screen Flow : Billing Finalized Flow

recordUpdates.description: Update Shop Pulse Points And Update The Total Amount Purchased
recordUpdates.name: Update_Customer_Data
recordUpdates.label: Update Customer Data

--> It should contain 10 digits

--> It should start with 6,7,8,9

fields.fieldText: Sorry!! We Couldn't Find Customer With Provided Mobile Number.

fields.name: FinalBillIfCustomerAvailable
fields.fieldText:

ShopPulsePoints Added: {!varShopPulsePointToAdd}
